verbs.description: JOINT BASE ANDREWS , Maryland — [ARGM-LOC: Under an American flag and dark night sky] , [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: personally] [V: welcomed] home [ARG1: three American detainees] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday morning] [ARGM-TMP: after they were released from North Korea] .

JOINT BASE ANDREWS , Maryland — Under an American flag and dark night sky , US President Donald Trump personally welcomed home three American detainees Thursday morning after they [V: were] released from North Korea .

JOINT BASE ANDREWS , Maryland — Under an American flag and dark night sky , US President Donald Trump personally welcomed home three American detainees Thursday morning after [ARG1: they] were [V: released] [ARG2: from North Korea] .
